channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: After Zomato, Deepinder Goyal returns with a $54M brain-monitoring bet
item.description: Zomato co-founder Deepinder Goyal's new wearable startup Temple has raised $54 million in a friends-and-family round at a post-money valuation of about $190 million.

item.title: No data shared — Private Internet Access reinforces its no-log claims with independent audit and transparency report
item.description: The VPN provider has successfully passed its third no-log audit since its first certification in 2022. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: There’s a Wild Reason Scotch Tape Screeches—and It Has to Do With the Speed of Sound
item.description: Fractures travel along the adhesive at nearly twice the speed of sound, producing tiny sonic booms.

item.title: I've been using these super-cheap headphones for a month — I'm surprised to report they sound great
item.description: The OneOdio Focus A1 Pro are bargain headphones, with a great sound and long-lasting battery. They aren't without flaws though, so check this review before you buy.

item.title: Samsung's newest Galaxy Buds 4 Pro are available for preorder — here's why I'm buying them at Amazon
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds4 Pro are officially available to preorder, and I recommend buying them from Amazon to score a free $30 gift card.

item.title: The Next Generation of ‘Pokémon’ Games Is Here
item.description: As the beloved critter-capturing series turns 30, a new region of adventures will open up to fans next year.

item.title: Surprise weekend sale is live at Best Buy — I've picked out the 22 best deals on TVs, laptops, games, and more tech
item.description: I've looked through this weekend's surprise Best Buy sale and hand-picked the 22 best tech deals that I would recommend as a bargain-hunting expert.

item.title: Ceci n’est pas une Gameboy : Pokémon annonce Game Music Collection, un lecteur de musique pour Rouge et Bleu
item.description: Le Pokémon Presents qui vient d'annoncer la 10e génération de Pokémon a débuté par l'annonce d'un objet étrange. Le Game Music Collection est un objet dédié à l'écoute de vos musiques de Pokémon Rouge et Bleu.

item.title: Ces écouteurs Motorola à l’autonomie généreuse bradés à moins de 100 € vont ravir les sportifs
item.description: Les plus grands sportifs pourront s'équiper de ces Motorola Moto Buds Loop pour de longues sessions de sport grâce à leur autonomie de huit heures. Ils sont actuellement disponibles avec une remise de 33 %.

item.title: OpenAI raises $110B in one of the largest private funding rounds in history
item.description: The new funding consists of a $50 billion investment from Amazon as well as $30 billion each from Nvidia and SoftBank, against a $730 billion valuation.

item.title: Netflix isn’t buying Warner Bros: all of the latest updates
item.description: Just months after Netflix struck a deal to acquire the Warner Bros. studio, HBO, HBO Max, and Warner Games, the streaming giant has backed out of the arrangement, declining to raise its offer beyond Paramount’s “best and final” bid. It’s just the latest twist in the acquisition saga, which started with a bidding war that […]

item.title: Decathlon va mettre des airbags dans ses vêtements
item.description: Le géant français Decathlon s’associe à la start-up française In&Motion afin d’intégrer des airbags électroniques à certains de ses équipements sportifs.

item.title: ExpressVPN launches suite of new protections against identity theft and fraud – ‘We’re bringing this level of protection and peace of mind to our ExpressVPN users’
item.description: ExpressVPN is moving identity theft protection to a dedicated Identity Defender app.

item.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Season 2 Will Have a Small Time Jump
item.description: Plus, the 'Talk to Me' TV series has found its cast.

item.title: TCL’s $7,000+ flagship TV is ready to fight
item.description: Since I saw the TCL X11L SQD-Mini LED TV at a pre-CES event in December, I've been eager to get a close look at it in my living room. At first glance, the TV impressed me enough that I named it the best TV of CES 2026. From the moment I completed Google TV setup […]

item.title: Memory shortage could cause the biggest dip in smartphone shipments in over a decade
item.description: IDC says phone makers will ship only 1.12 billion smartphones as compared to 1.26 billion last year.

item.title: How secure is your home Wi-Fi, really?
item.description: We trust a lot of our day-to-day browsing to our home Wi-Fi connection, but are there any gaping security gaps?

item.title: Google Messages déploie son option de partage de localisation en direct
item.description: Quelques jours après avoir été repérée, la fonctionnalité de partage de localisation en direct commence à faire son apparition sur Google Messages. De quoi retrouver facilement un contact perdu dans la foule.

item.title: Nvidia fait machine arrière en catastrophe sur ses derniers drivers, handicapants pour certaines machines
item.description: Pour la première fois depuis fort longtemps, Nvidia a annoncé faire machine arrière sur le déploiement d'un driver Game Ready / RTX Studio. Ce dernier générait, notamment, d'importants problèmes de contrôle des ventilateurs du GPU sur certaines machines.

item.title: Pokémon Presents 2026: All the news and trailers
item.description: It’s that time of year: A whole bunch of Pokémon news is incoming. February 27th is the date the franchise first debuted, and The Pokémon Company uses it as a chance to outline its plans in a Pokémon Presents showcase. Last year’s event included the announcement of Pokémon Champions, and the 2026 edition should be […]

item.title: Attendus en mars, les Samsung Galaxy A37 et A57 devraient vraiment s’améliorer au niveau de l’autonomie
item.description: Samsung s'apprête à revitaliser son milieu de gamme avec ses nouveaux Galaxy A37 et A57. Attendus dans les toutes prochaines semaines, les deux appareils devraient profiter d'une meilleure autonomie, mais pas seulement.

item.title: You might want to think twice about buying a third-party magnetic case for the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's S Pen may not play nicely with some magnetic cases, but a future S Pen could solve this problem.

item.title: The Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition is going global tomorrow with a new name
item.description: The Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition will be called the 'Leica Leitzphone powered by Xiaomi' when it goes global on February 28.

item.title: ‘We cannot in good conscience accede to their request’: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei draws a line in the sand in standoff with US government
item.description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei has made clear the boundaries of the Pentagon's use for Claude, and the ball is now in Pete Hegseth's court.

item.title: Aliro : et si votre smartphone devenait vraiment votre clé de maison ?
item.description: La bonne vieille clé de maison est-elle en passe d'être ringardisée ? Un nouveau standard soutenu par l'industrie, Aliro, veut en effet accélérer l'adoption des serrures connectées, à déverrouiller avec un smartphone ou une montre connectée.

item.title: South Korea opens the door to let Google Maps operate fully
item.description: After years of appeals, Google has finally won approval to export high-precision geographic information out of South Korea and provide proper Google Maps services in the country, including walking and real-time driving directions.

item.title: Gunship has created 'its most ferocious track yet' for Toxic Commando — 'When John Carpenter calls… you answer'
item.description: Synthwave band Gunship has released a new single for John Carpenter's Toxic Commando.

item.title: À mi-chemin entre Animal Crossing et Minecraft, Pokémon Pokopia sur Switch 2 est en précommande au meilleur prix juste ici
item.description: Pokémon Pokopia sortira en exclusivité sur Switch 2 le 5 mars 2026. Ce jeu fait la part belle à la construction créative type Minecraft, avec une simulation de vie cosy à la Animal Crossing. E.Leclerc le propose pour 58,95 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros.

item.title: Microsoft brings Windows restore to more enterprise devices - so you don't have to worry about continuous backups
item.description: Windows Backup for Organizations now prompts users at first sign-in to reinstate previous settings and app configurations.

item.title: On s'est trompés sur le champ magnétique de la Lune depuis Apollo : voici ce qu'on vient de comprendre
item.description: Les roches d’Apollo racontent une histoire inattendue : il y a 3,5 milliards d’années, la Lune aurait brièvement généré un champ magnétique presque aussi intense que celui de la Terre. Comment un si petit astre a-t-il pu produire une telle puissance ? Une nouvelle étude avance une réponse.

item.title: Nintendo urges Switch 2 players to install Resident Evil Requiem's day-one patch to address several fixes
item.description: Nintendo has suggested that Switch 2 users install Resident Evil Requiem's day-one patch, which is said to contain "several fixes" before returning to Racoon City.

item.title: Why ‘Star Wars’ Is the Franchise Ryan Gosling Finally Landed On
item.description: The 'Project Hail Mary' star has, for the most part, avoided large franchises. That changes with 2027's 'Star Wars: Starfighter.'

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein saw promise in Bitcoin — and its far-right supporters
item.description: The tranche of Jeffrey Epstein emails and files released on January 30th tie the infamous pedophile, sex trafficker, and influence peddler to elite figures across the tech industry. The world of cryptocurrency is no exception. Epstein's connections are intriguing, disturbing - and worth mapping closely. With his interest first piqued as early as 2011, Epstein […]...

item.title: A cheap MacBook is the perfect way for Apple to win over Windows users
item.description: The MacBook is coming back — or at least, that's what the rumors claim. Next week, Apple is expected to announce a colorful, low-cost, non-Air, non-Pro MacBook powered by one of its mobile processors. By avoiding its pricier M-series chips, Apple may reportedly be able to reach a low $699 or $799 price for the MacBook. The $999 MacBook Air is the cheapest laptop on the company's website right now, but Apple also sold the older M1 MacBook Air at Walmart for $700 in 2024, which later went down to $650 last year.That Walmart deal was a smart way for Apple to test out the viability of cheaper MacB...

item.title: Inside OpenAI’s fast-growing Codex: The people building the AI that codes alongside you
item.description: OpenAI leaders reveal how the company’s rapidly growing coding agent works, why developers are delegating tasks to it, and what that means for the future of software work. OpenAI’s Codex AI coding assistant is having a growth spurt. OpenAI tells Fast Company that its weekly active users have tripled since the start of the year, while overall usage (measured in tokens) has increased fivefold. The surge is likely driven by the release of new models—GPT-5.2 last December and GPT-5.3-Codex in early February—as well as the launch of Codex’s app version a few weeks ago. OpenAI says the app has been ...

item.title: How Starbucks designed its new iconic cup and big comfy chair
item.description: The coffee chain wants to revive hospitality with premium mugs and a plush chair that hearkens back to its ’90s heyday. Since taking over the coffee chain in 2024, Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol has been on a mission to go “back to Starbucks” and rekindle the feeling of warmth inside the coffee giant.

item.title: Everything announced at Pokémon Presents February 2026: Pokémon Winds and Waves officially revealed
item.description: Tune into our live coverage of the Pokémon Presents showcase. We'll post about each and every announcement as it happens.

item.title: Job hunting 101: Dealing with the 5 stages of grief after a rejection letter
item.description: If I’m rejected for yet another job, I’m gonna crash out. When the email pinged in my inbox, I didn’t even bother to open it immediately. I already knew what it was. One glance at the subject line told me everything.
